mapper.select: select u.user_id as user_id, u.nickname as nickname, u.profile_image_url as profile_image_url, mm.role as member_role from meeting_date_voting mdv left join users u on mdv.user_id = u.user_id left join meeting_member mm on mdv.user_id = mm.user_id and mdv.meeting_id = mm.meeting_id where mdv.meeting_id = #{meetingId} and mdv.date = #{date}
